definition: to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

pinyin: shang4 hu1 xi1 dao4 gan3 ran3

sentences.english: A non-productive cough does not expel sputum from the respiratory tract.
sentences.chinese: 乾咳指不從呼吸道排出痰液的咳嗽。

sentences.english: Significant differences between the bronchial asthma and the repeated respiratory infections were found.
sentences.chinese: 發現支氣管哮喘和反覆呼吸道感染之間差別顯著。

sentences.english: When wind blows, the saline dust makes the local people liable to respiratory diseases.
sentences.chinese: 風吹起鹽沙，引起當地居民的呼吸道疾病。

sentences.english: The combustion of silane forms silicon oxides that can cause irritation to the respiratory tract.
sentences.chinese: 硅烷燃燒生成可以導致呼吸道刺激的氧化硅。

sentences.english: The man’s 7-year-old son developed respiratory symptoms on 16 October.
sentences.chinese: 該男子的7歲兒子在10月16日出現呼吸道症狀。

sentences.english: However, the authors note, the link between asthma and respiratory tract infections is not well understood.
sentences.chinese: 然而，作者對哮喘和呼吸道感染之間的聯繫還不清楚。

sentences.english: Transmission is believed to be through prolonged skin contact orrespiratory secretions.
sentences.chinese: 其傳播方式爲長時間的皮膚接觸和呼吸道的分泌物。

sentences.english: In this case, the change to semi-sitting position and relevant medication helped reestablish her ventilation and save her life.
sentences.chinese: 在此病例中，半坐臥姿勢及藥物重建了其呼吸道通氣。

sentences.english: Asthma is a respiratory tract allergic disease commonly encountered by children.
sentences.chinese: 哮喘是小兒常見的呼吸道變態反應性疾病。

sentences.english: The Herpes simples viruses that has been found in sporadic cases of upper and lower respiratory infection.
sentences.chinese: 單皰病毒在上下呼吸道感染中爲散發病例。

sentences.english: When influenza strikes the lungs, the lining of the respiratory tract is damaged. Thetissues become swollen and inflamed.
sentences.chinese: 當流感病毒侵入肺部時，呼吸道薄膜便被破壞。

sentences.english: Conclusion Zhongjiefeng is an effective and safe in the treatment of AURI.
sentences.chinese: 結論腫節風治療急性上呼吸道感染安全有效。

sentences.english: Conclusion Silver nitrate was of obviously the inhibitory effects on common respiratory pathogens.
sentences.chinese: 結論硝酸銀對常見呼吸道病原體有明顯的抑制作用。

sentences.english: HN is a common virus, Coxsackie virus, other parts may cause respiratory tract infections.
sentences.chinese: HN病毒是一種常見病毒，會引起呼吸道等部位感染。

sentences.english: The presence of an associated skin rash supports the likelihood of RSV infection.
sentences.chinese: 如果患者同時出現皮疹，則支持呼吸道合胞病毒感染。

sentences.english: Metaplasia of laryngeal respiratory epithelium has occurred here in a smoker.
sentences.chinese: 嗜煙者喉部呼吸道上皮化生。

pinyin: shang4 hu1 xi1 dao4 gan3 ran3
